price: ߌߓߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߤߌߡߊ߫ ߞߏߝߐ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߞߣߐ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ߕߌ߯ ߟߊ߬ߝߐ߬ߓߊ߯ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
